SELECT d.title, d.goal_amt, COUNT(f.don_id) AS donationCount, (SUM(f.don_amt) / d.goal_amt) * 100 AS donationRatio, c.fac_name AS facilityName, d.rec_stat FROM donation d LEFT JOIN don_ledger f ON d.don_id = f.don_id LEFT JOIN facility c ON d.fac_id = c.fac_id
GROUP BY d.title, d.goal_amt, c.fac_name, d.rec_stat
